page.title: 06NEWSAGENTS
page.content: This store is at the heart of Trefnant, it's owner is Mr. Edward Gwyn Humpreys who lives there with his wife,Marlene, and his daughter Catrin Elenor. He has been managing the shop for 12 months, and has planning permission to knock a wall down to extend the shop. His wife runs the hairdressers next door, and just down the road there is an old telephone exchange which she would like to convert into a hairdressers. Between six and eight in the morning is treir busiest time as everyone comes in to get the morning newspapers, especially the farmers as they are up so early. He had been in the Police Force for four years but had decided to start his own business as a shopkeeper. They were friendly people and he enjoyed his work a lot.
